notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Drs Kumar, Filer and Tidwell have designed the experiments and planned the statistical analysis. Ms Allen and Mr Thompson performed the experiments under supervision of Dr Kumar. Dr Habte-Tsion performed the statistical analyses. Ms. Allen and Dr Habte-Tsion were primarily responsible for drafting the manuscript with critical insights and editing from Drs Kumar, Tidwell and Filer.
